defaultMessage: A graphic representing the opt-out user interface
Search for a company using the search box below. If the company you are looking for is not on the list, you can add it by providing a contact email.
Fill in your name, email and home address. This information is needed for companies to locate you on their systems and confirm that you are an EU resident (we do not keep any of this information).
Click the Send button to create a formal GDPR Erasure Request email addressed to the relevant person at the selected company. You can then review the email and send it.
{link} (GDPR) recently introduced in Europe requires companies to erase personal data upon request. If an organisation does not comply within 30 days it can face steep fees.

This service was created because we believe that privacy matters, and that exercising your right to privacy should be easy. This is a free service. We do not offer complementary services to the companies on our list. We do not collect your personal data.
